ygData.subject: Re: Research
ygData.msgSnippet: hehe , torn on left is right half torn on right is left half...sorry :) heheh -Aeramus ... From: Daniel Devorkin  To:
ygData.messageBody:
hehe , torn on left is right half
torn on right is left half...sorry :) heheh

-Aeramus

----- Original Message -----
From: Daniel Devorkin <devo@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 8:21 PM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Research


> From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>
>
> look at the picture, you can tell which half you have by the picture, if
the
> page is torn on the left, then you have the left half.
> if the page is torn on the right, then you have the right half.
> put both of the pages into the book, the left half and the right
half....so
> that the tears face eachother. then press combine.
>
> -Aeramus
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Jim F <jimf@...>
> To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
> Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 5:59 AM
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Research
>
>
> > From: "Jim F" <jimf@...>
> >
> > Yes, but does that mean that there are also the full pages?
> > When I get info on the pages it says Page26 of Tasarins Grimiore not
left
> or
> > right half.
> >
> > Z
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Jason Cent <jcent@...>
> > To: Jim F <jimf@...>
> > Cc: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 8:39 AM
> > Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Research
> >

> > >
> > > yes, there is a RIGHT and LEFT side to Tasharins pages....you will
> > > need one of each...and then combine..
> > >
> > >
> > > Fistlebane
> > >
> > >
> > > From: Jim F <jimf@...> on 07/08/99 05:16 AM PDT
> > > To: eqenchanters@onelist.com@SMTP@Exchange
> > > cc:
> > > Subject: [eqenchanters] Research
> > >
> > > First of all thanks for the replies on Rune I.
> > >
> > > I still have a question on research though.
> > >
> > > I was on baelish's EQ Enchanter site looking at the research
> > > section, it says That for level 16 spells I need page 23 for levitate
24
> > for
> > > disempower and 26 for Mesmerization.
> > >
> > > My problem is that I have had all these pages, put them in the
> > > book(one at a time) and hit combine. I get the message those items in
> that
> > > combination failed to produce anything.
> > >
> > >
> > > I was then told I have to have the left and right pages, but under
> > > the page description It says just page 23 or page 24 of Tasarins
> Grimoire.
> > >
> > > What am I doing wrong?
> > > I also was not allowed to put any practices into Research.
> > >
> > > Sorry for the long winded questions but I am a bit confused about
> > > research.
> > >
> > > Zahlhedren
> > > Karana
